item.title: OpenAI API
Alexey Guzey
item.description:
Alexey Guzey on Twitter

‚Äúkey learnings over last few yrs: 1. strong intuition != intuition is right -> don‚Äôt trust intuitions without POKING&interrogation ->don‚Äôt go >80% belief from intuition 2. nobody thinks from first principles and beliefs ~always just post hoc‚Äôd intuitions -> ~never defer beliefs‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/alexeyguzey/status/1580943233751740416

source: Best of Twitter - September 9- October 23, 2022 (1/2)

item.title: Alexey Guzey
item.description:
Alexey Guzey on Twitter

‚Äú3. i can outargue anyone but unless my intuition is good and grounded (poking/tinkering/interrogation are necessary), just don‚Äôt go >80% trust in arguments. Good chance of missing key ground level detail literally impossible to see without being on the ground level‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/alexeyguzey/status/1580944271636455424

source: Best of Twitter - September 9- October 23, 2022 (1/2)

item.title: Alexey Guzey
item.description:
Alexey Guzey on Twitter

‚Äú4. ppl good at thinking think that thinking is everything; people good at execution think that execution is everything. neither are right and intersection of both is ~0 -> either find this intersection or talk to both thinkers & executors to get right picture‚Äù
